title: Nuseed U.S. & Canada - Sunflower Harvest Combine Seed Pour

tasks.task: Driving and maintaining a farming vehicle.
subtasks: Starting the agricultural vehicle engine.
Adjusting the steering wheel to turn the vehicle.
Accelerating the vehicle by pressing the gas pedal.
Braking the vehicle by pressing the brake pedal.
Changing gears using the shifter.
Steering the vehicle left and right using the steering wheel.
Navigating the vehicle through fields.
Attaching the combine's intake conveyor belt.
Adjusting the combine's header height.
Starting the combine's engine.
Operating the combine's thresher.
Regulating the combine's chaffer speed.
Monitoring the combine's grain tank level.
Cleaning the combine's sieves and ducts.
Driving the combine through harvested fields.

tasks.task: Attaching and detaching implements to a tractor.
subtasks: Aligning implement hitch to tractor drawbar.
Tightening implement couplings.
Lifting the implement onto the tractor.
Lowering the implement onto the ground.
Disconnecting the implement from the tractor.
